DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Volunteers may eligible study : Are 18 40 year age . Have negative pregnancy test time entry agree use birth control 1 month prior first injection active followup . Have normal history physical examination . Are negative Hepatitis B . Are HIVnegative . Have blood cell infect EpsteinBarr virus . Are available followup study ( 24 month ) . Exclusion Criteria Volunteers eligible study : Have sexually transmit disease 1 sex partner previous 12 month . Are pregnant breastfeeding . Have immune disease , chronic illness , malignancy . Persons cancer surgically remove think cure eligible . Have use medication affect immune system . Have medical mental condition job may interfere study .
